javax.portlet

Interface Mutable

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ActionResponse, ActionURL, EventResponse, MutableActionParameters, MutablePortletParameters, MutablePortletState, MutableRenderParameters, MutableResourceParameters, PortletURL, RenderURL, StateAwareResponse
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ActionResponseWrapper, EventResponseWrapper

    public interface Mutable
    This is a marker interface indicating that the implementing object contains methods for updating portelt state information.
    Since:
    3.0
    See Also:
    MutablePortletState, MutablePortletParameters
